product.name: Revlon PhotoReady Primer, Shadow + Sparkle Palette
product.description:
Easily create limitless looks with this one Revlon PhotoReady Primer, Shadow + Sparkle Palette.
The palette features a primer, 3 highly pigmented shadows, and a 
sparkle top coat. You can use wet for more colour intensity and add the sparkle top 
coat for a multi-dimensional, intensely shimmering effect.Shadow Shades:
